tasks.title: Metrics: record preview generation time, cache hit rate
Cleanup daemon: periodic sweep and on-exit cleanup
Phase planning document created and aligned with roadmap
Implement TempPreviewService with disk cache + TTL cleanup
Wire duplicate compare UI to prefer temp previews when needed
Make Visual Compare the default view for duplicate groups
Implement temp preview invalidation on source mtime/hash change
Tests: RAW/HEIC preview generation and UI integration
Add zoom/pan and side-by-side swap controls with keyboard shortcuts
Settings: toggle for temp preview generation and max cache size
Docs: brief user help for Visual Compare defaults and temp previews
Temp previews: produce browser-valid WEBP for HEIC/RAW
CompareView UX: img onerror fallback; better handling for video
Duplicates list UI: constrain overflow/ellipsis for long paths
Preview API for non-images/video: correct content-type + PNG fallback
